narrative.narrative: Quikjet Airlines is a cargo airline based at Delhi,India. It started in 2007 and in 2013 suspended operation. In February 2016 it resumed operations with a 737-400F. It is serving 3 routes from Delhi, all domestic. These are to Bangaluru/Bangalore,Chennai and Hyderabad. It used an ATR 72-200 until 2013. Swiss airline Farnair bought a 36.2% stake in February 2012. And then they had a 50.93% stake, and then in May 2015 the India Foreign Investment Promotion Board approved an increase to 72.59%. Farnair itself changed names to ASL Airlines Switzerland in June of 2015.
